title: An Orc champ?
body:
i have no idea what to call him.
i guess, melee fighter 
hp488+71 5.2/5sec +0.45
MP310+72 3.8/5sec +0.37
AD 48+2.22
Atk speed 0.689+0.89%%
Armour 25+2
MR 25+2
speed 330
Passive: Berserker Strength Gains Damage equal to 6% of max hp.
Q:Heavy Shop/ Piercing Spear. 120mp 26/25/24/23/22sec
Heavy shop: Deals 3/4/5/6/7% max hp +20/50/90/140/200physical damage. Heals 10/15/20/25/30% of the damage dealt.
Piercing Spear: Throws a spear in a line so fast that its almost impossible to dodge and passes through 3 units.
Dealing AD+50/75/100/125/150 damage to the first units and 75% of the damage to the unit behind it. The spear will become stuck inside the second unit. Causing it to be slowed by 15% and attacking the unit with Axe or Heavy chop will deal 4% of their max hp as bonus damage.
W: Berserker's Blood 30/40/50/60/70mp 11.5sec (not effected by CDR)
Passive: for every 60/70/80/90/100 missing hp gains 3/6/9/12/15 more AD   
Active: Activate to lose passive but heal 1/1.5/2/2.5/3% current hp on attacks for 4/5.5/7/8.5/10sec
E: Switch 1.5sec CD
Switches weapons. Gains more effects upon ranking up the ability.
Axe: Default weapon of the ORC Rank up to become stronger (starting at rank 2) gaining 10/20/30/40% atk speed.
Spear: becomes ranged attacks of 500 range. ( Starting at rank 2) Gains 10/15/20/25% critical strike chance. 
R: Gar'tuls Blessings. 125/150/175mp 150/135/120sec
 Summons the Spear/Axe(current weapon) of his warlord ancestor. 
AXE: Adds 50/100/150 damage and 50 attack range, axe is enlarged. As well as gaining 10/20/30% life steal. 
Spear: Spear becomes lighter but stronger gaining 75 atk range and 50/100/150 damage, every hit excites ORC even more gaining 10/15/20% attack speed and 5/7.5/10%movement speed every 2nd attack for 5 sec and stacks up to 5 times.
Lasts 10 seconds.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=ƒamous,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=qY68Il9O,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-01T06:44:40.013+0000)
>
> Sion 2.0???

well then again sion isnt an orc

TBH, i don't think this is like sion i think it's like Elise/Nidalee/Jayce since they both have the style change weapon change thing... for the Orc's E/R. {{champion:76}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:126}}
i think his w should be a bit nurfed and his ult stats should be changed a bit???
yea... im gonna reduce his ult AXE range from 50/100/150 to 75 at all ranks
Reminds me of troll warlord. But his passives alone are a free infinity edge, which is slightly worrying.

> [{quoted}](name=Felsummoner,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=qY68Il9O,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-01T06:41:31.155+0000)

> Reminds me of troll warlord. But his passives alone are a free infinity edge, which is slightly worrying.
well i guess so, hey but trynd has like 35%
